article_text:
Manhattan Sinatra Will Be Focus of Geffen Hall Gala

The campaign to renovate the New York Philharmonic’s home will make Frank Sinatra the focus of its first fundraiser.

The Dec. 3 gala, at the newly renamed David Geffen Hall at Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts, will celebrate Sinatra’s music and his centennial (Dec. 12). Lincoln Center and...

article_summary:
Lincoln Center and...
Manhattan Sinatra Will Be Focus of Geffen Hall GalaThe campaign to renovate the New York Philharmonic’s home will make Frank Sinatra the focus of its first fundraiser.
The Dec. 3 gala, at the newly renamed David Geffen Hall at Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts, will celebrate Sinatra’s music and his centennial (Dec. 12).
